Package com.salesforce.multicloudj.sts.client

Class StsClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.multicloudj.sts.client.StsClient
  • public class StsClient
extends Object
    StsClient class in the Portable Client for interacting with Security Token Service (STS) in a substrate agnostic way.
